Compatible with iOS 10

CCRecorder allows you to record your screen with only one click, on a button in the Control Center. This might remind you of CCRecord, which however doesn't support Flipswitch. Also, with CCRecorder you'll see a small icon in the Status Bar when you're recording, so you by accident don't forget that you actually are recording the screen :)

Configure options from Setttings.

No Screenshots for this item.

- This package will move back to my old server after the crash weeks ago. - Fixes a small bug where the recording could get interrupted when getting a call... - New Server for DRM. After this update, CCRecorder should work without warnings!
